text: Višnjićevo (), formerly Grk (), is a village located in the municipality of Šid, Serbia. As of 2011 census, it has a population of 1,683 inhabitants. ==Name== Grk was renamed after World War I to honour Filip Višnjić, who is buried in the village. ==See also== * List of places in Serbia * List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina == References == Category:Populated places in Syrmia
title: Višnjićevo
